verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> again <WH3254> <WH8686> did <WH6213> <WH8800> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, when Ehud <WH164> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>.

And the YY <WH3068> sold <WH4376> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Kanahan <WH3667>, that reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> in Hazor <WH2674>; the captain <WH8269> of whose host <WH6635> was Sisra <WH5516>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Harosheth <WH2800> of the goyim <WH1471>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>: for he had nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>; and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> he mightily <WH2394> oppressed <WH3905> <WH8804> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And D'vorah <WH1683>, a prophetess <WH5031>, the wife <WH802> of Lapidoth <WH3941>, she judged <WH8199> <WH8802> Yisra'EL <WH3478> at that time <WH6256>.

And she dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> under the palm tree <WH8560> of D'vorah <WH1683> between Ramah <WH7414> and Beit-El <WH1008> in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>: and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came up <WH5927> <WH8799> to her for judgment <WH4941>.

And she sent <WH7971> <WH8799> and called <WH7121> <WH8799> Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> out of Kedeshnaphtali <WH6943>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Hath not the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, saying, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> and draw <WH4900> <WH8804> toward mount <WH2022> Tavor <WH8396>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> with thee ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321> and of the children <WH1121> of Z'vulun <WH2074> ?

And I will draw <WH4900> <WH8804> unto thee to the river <WH5158> Kishon <WH7028> Sisra <WH5516>, the captain <WH8269> of Jabin's <WH2985> army <WH6635>, with his chariots <WH7393> and his multitude <WH1995>; and I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> him into thine hand <WH3027>.

And Barak <WH1301> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, If thou wilt go <WH3212> <WH8799> with me, then I will go <WH1980> <WH8804>: but if thou wilt not go <WH3212> <WH8799> with me, then I will not go <WH3212> <WH8799>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will surely <WH1980> <WH8800> go <WH3212> <WH8799> with thee: notwithstanding <WH657> the journey <WH1870> that thou takest <WH1980> <WH8802> shall not be for thine honour <WH8597>; for the YY <WH3068> shall sell <WH4376> <WH8799> Sisra <WH5516> into the hand <WH3027> of a woman <WH802>. And D'vorah <WH1683> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> with Barak <WH1301> to Kedesh <WH6943>.

And Barak <WH1301> called <WH2199> <WH8686> Z'vulun <WH2074> and Naftali <WH5321> to Kedesh <WH6943>; and he went up <WH5927> <WH8799> with ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> at his feet <WH7272>: and D'vorah <WH1683> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> with him.

Now Heber <WH2268> the Kenite <WH7017>, which was of the children <WH1121> of Hobab <WH2246> the father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802> of Mosheh <WH4872>, had severed <WH6504> <WH8737> himself from the Kenites <WH7017>, and pitched <WH5186> <WH8799> his tent <WH168> unto the plain <WH436> of Zaanaim <WH6815>, which is by Kedesh <WH6943>.
And they shewed <WH5046> <WH8686> Sisra <WH5516> that Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> was gone up <WH5927> <WH8804> to mount <WH2022> Tavor <WH8396>.

And Sisra <WH5516> gathered together <WH2199> <WH8686> all his chariots <WH7393>, even nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>, and all the people <WH5971> that were with him, from Harosheth <WH2800> of the goyim <WH1471> unto the river <WH5158> of Kishon <WH7028>.

And D'vorah <WH1683> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Barak <WH1301>, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>; for this is the day <WH3117> in which the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> Sisra <WH5516> into thine hand <WH3027>: is not the YY <WH3068> gone out <WH3318> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thee? So Barak <WH1301> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> from mount <WH2022> Tavor <WH8396>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> after <WH310> him.

And the YY <WH3068> discomfited <WH2000> <WH8799> Sisra <WH5516>, and all his chariots <WH7393>, and all his host <WH4264>, with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719> before <WH6440> Barak <WH1301>; so that Sisra <WH5516> lighted down <WH3381> <WH8799> off his chariot <WH4818>, and fled away <WH5127> <WH8799> on his feet <WH7272>.

But Barak <WH1301> pursued <WH7291> <WH8804> after <WH310> the chariots <WH7393>, and after the host <WH4264>, unto Harosheth <WH2800> of the goyim <WH1471>: and all the host <WH4264> of Sisra <WH5516> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; and there was not a man <WH259> left <WH7604> <WH8738>.

Howbeit Sisra <WH5516> fled away <WH5127> <WH8804> on his feet <WH7272> to the tent <WH168> of Jael <WH3278> the wife <WH802> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite <WH7017>: for there was peace <WH7965> between Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> and the house <WH1004> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite <WH7017>.

And Jael <WH3278> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> Sisra <WH5516>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Turn in <WH5493> <WH8798>, my lord <WH113>, turn in <WH5493> <WH8798> to me; fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not. And when he had turned in <WH5493> <WH8799> unto her into the tent <WH168>, she covered <WH3680> <WH8762> him with a mantle <WH8063>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a little <WH4592> water <WH4325> to drink <WH8248> <WH8685>; for I am thirsty <WH6770> <WH8804>. And she opened <WH6605> <WH8799> a bottle <WH4997> of milk <WH2461>, and gave him drink <WH8248> <WH8686>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> him.

Again he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Stand in <WH5975> <WH8798> the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168>, and it shall be, when any man <WH376> doth come <WH935> <WH8799> and enquire <WH7592> <WH8804> of thee, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Is there <WH3426> any man <WH376> here <WH3426>? that thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804>, No.

Then Jael <WH3278> Heber's <WH2268> wife <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a nail <WH3489> of the tent <WH168>, and took <WH7760> <WH8799> an hammer <WH4718> in her hand <WH3027>, and went <WH935> <WH8799> softly <WH3814> unto him, and smote <WH8628> <WH8799> the nail <WH3489> into his temples <WH7541>, and fastened <WH6795> <WH8799> it into the ground <WH776>: for he was fast asleep <WH7290> <WH8738> and weary <WH5774> <WH8799>. So he died <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And, behold, as Barak <WH1301> pursued <WH7291> <WH8802> Sisra <WH5516>, Jael <WH3278> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and I will shew <WH7200> <WH8686> thee the man <WH376> whom thou seekest <WH1245> <WH8764>. And when he came <WH935> <WH8799> into her tent, behold, Sisra <WH5516> lay <WH5307> <WH8802> dead <WH4191> <WH8801>, and the nail <WH3489> was in his temples <WH7541>.
So 'Elohim <WH430> subdued <WH3665> <WH8686> on that day <WH3117> Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Kanahan <WH3667> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the hand <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> prospered <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH1980> <WH8800>, and prevailed <WH7186> against Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Kanahan <WH3667>, until they had destroyed <WH3772> <WH8689> Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Kanahan <WH3667>.
